EmailTemplate.description: Used to notify sales team member about dealers eligibility for a program
EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Eligible Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Dealer : {!Program_Enrollment__c.Account__c} is eligible for Program : {!Program__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Program_Enrollment__c.Sales_Contact__c},
This is to notify that {!Program_Enrollment__c.Account__c} is eligible for Program {!Program__c.Name}.
Thanks, Salesforce Admin
